name: MD ARMAAN ANSARI

education.degree: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering

education.school: Dr Virendra Swarup Memorial Public School

projects.name: StoreFront
projects.description: Implemented production-ready, backend for E-commerce website. Build related API endpoints and customise the admin panel. Used Celery and Redis for asynchronous tasks. Used Docker and Docker-Compose for deployment.

projects.name: Endeavour
projects.description: Architected the backend system for a college event website, facilitating seamless registration for 13 events and handling a total of approximately 2000 registrations, resulting in a 50% increase in user conversion rates. The website incorporated secure JWT authentication and a payment gateway to enable online transactions. Configured AWS services (EC2, S3, SES) for scalability and efficiency.

experiences.description: Developing, designing and debugging REST APIs using Node, DynamoDB and Serverless framework for platform. Executed comprehensive security checks and vulnerability analysis using industry-leading tools like Bearer; identified and resolved 20 critical security issues. Configured Custom Authentication, OAuth 2.0, and multi-factor authentication through AWS Cognito. For optimal code functionality, integrate multiple AWS services including Amazon Cognito, AWS Lambda, Amazon S3, Amazon SNS, and Amazon SES.

Designed product backend architecture and performed feasibility analysis. Developed backend for loan platform, boosting revenue by 25% and configured AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, CloudWatch) for scalability and efficiency. Integrated KYC framework and third-party APIs for compliance and WhatsApp chatbot for enhanced user interaction. Developed an in-house dashboard for real-time monitoring.

Implemented KYC framework for user onboarding, verifying uploaded documents using Django and Django Rest Framework. Intregrated Whatsapp Chatbot for automation and better user engagement in a website.

degree: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering
